School.Name: Stanford University
School.Description: I am interested in studying how machine learning is changing the way we design software-systems and applications, including the way we think about fundemental systems abstractions and tradeoffs. I am part of the Hazy Research group, which is affiliated with the Stanford AI Lab, StatML Group, and DAWN Lab.

School.Name: University of Pennsylvania, Jerome Fisher Program in Management & Technology
School.Degree: BSE CS (Engineering School), BS Economics with Finance Concentration (Wharton School)
School.Description: At Penn, I was involved in: Penn Varsity Womens' Squash Team, CS Research, CS Teaching Assistant, Penn Women in Physics Club President.
